articles.title: Tencent Uses Facial Recognition to Ban Kids Gaming Past Bedtime - Bloomberg
articles.description: In the latest bid to curb video-game addiction in China, tech giant Tencent Holdings Ltd. has launched a facial recognition system to stop minors gaming into the night. The initiative will prevent people under 18 from playing between 10 p.m. and 8 a.m.
